content:
What Happened Aaron Taylor-Johnson and his wife Sam Taylor-Johnson attended Paris Haute Couture Week on Tuesday, January 27, 2026. The couple was spotted at the Saint Laurent Menswear Fall/Winter 2026-2027 show, where they posed for photographs together.
The following day, on January 28, the couple was seen checking out of their Paris hotel and heading to the airport.
Key Details At the Saint Laurent Show Aaron Taylor-Johnson, 35, wore a brown leather-look jacket and suit for the event. Sam Taylor-Johnson, 58, opted for a deep green shiny coat. Sam wore her long blonde hair down and accessorized with dark sunglasses, while Aaron sported his longer hair in curls and wore an eye-catching watch.
The couple stayed close throughout the event, cuddling as they posed for photographers.
Departing Paris When checking out of their hotel on January 28, Aaron wore a black jacket over a white T-shirt with gray pants. Sam wore a black leather jacket, leopard-print scarf, and black jeans.
About the Couple Detail Information Aaron Taylor-Johnson Actor, 35 years old Sam Taylor-Johnson Filmmaker, 58 years old Marriage 2012, Somerset, England Sam’s Notable Work Director of Fifty Shades of Grey Aaron Taylor-Johnson is a Golden Globe-winning actor known for his roles in Kraven the Hunter and the upcoming 28 Years Later. He is also set to appear in the horror film Werwulf, reuniting with Nosferatu co-star Lily-Rose Depp and director Robert Eggers.
What’s Next Aaron Taylor-Johnson continues work on Werwulf, which is currently filming in England. His name has also been mentioned as a potential candidate for the next James Bond.
Source: Just Jared, Nine.com.au
Last updated: 2026-02-01 08:40 UTC

title: Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Wife Sam Attend Saint Laurent Show at Paris Fashion Week
